commitResults.messageTitle: Level-0
Revert "Level-0"
-Added greeting message -Added shutdown message
-Changed name of file to be the same as bot name -Added echo function -Added shutdown function
-Added function to remember commands (up to 100 commands) -Added function for "list" command

-Removed unused Duke.java file -Added Task class (Task.java) -Added function for "mark" -Added function for "unmark" -Changed "list" to use Task class -Changed ASCII art to static final variables -Changed "add" function to use Task class
-Fixed formatting for ASCII art
-Fixed not taking in mulitple words
-Fixed program crashing when using mark command with a string
-Changed if-else statements to switch-case statements
Added: Child classes of "Task" for Level-4
commitResults.messageBody:
Added: Support for "Deadline", "Event", "ToDo"

Improved: Flavour text

Fixed: Bugs involving "mark" and "unmark" cases

Fixed: Constants not having uppercase names

Added: Divider to each reply from the bot

Added: There is now a toString overload function in "Task"

Added: Type is now tracked in "Task"

Changed: Default case no longer adds a task, instead it prompts the user again

Changed: "Task" no longer used as a standalone type

Fixed: Error message no longer print out multiple times when an invalid input is typed

commitResults.messageTitle: Changed: Name of .java file back to Duke to prevent script errors
commitResults.messageBody: Tried: Ran runtest.bat and changed EXPECTED to expected output and added input test case

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: DukeException for error handing
commitResults.messageBody:
Changed: Made ASCII art smaller

Changed: Existing error checking now uses exceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed: Removed bugs caused by new error handing
Changed: ASCII goodbye art;
Fixed: Made some class variables protected
Fixed: Rectified bugs introduced in recent changes
Fixed: Removed some extraneous braces
Added: Grouped all classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody: Added: Added echo method to improve readability

commitResults.messageTitle: Replaced: Changed fixed size list to ArrayLists
commitResults.messageBody: Added: Added skeleton code for help function

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed: Changed implementation of list number such that it works in line with the deletion
commitResults.messageBody: Added: Function to delete list items based on the list number

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: Read from file and write from file
Fixed: Resolved merge conflict
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed: Corrected bugs caused by saving file

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: Function to create directory for data text file and text file itself added.
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed: Resolved bug causing reading of file to fail

commitResults.messageTitle: Fixed: Resolved issues with event getTask() member methods
commitResults.messageBody: Fixed: Resolved issues with writing event objects into data text file

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: FileManager, DataManager, DukeMessages classes for better management
commitResults.messageBody:
DukeMessages: Error message and add messages stored within along with printing functionality

DataManager: Separately stored data in this class, methods to modify data moved to this class as well

FileManager: Used for reading and writing .txt file stored locally

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: Improved implementation of reading files such that the print messaged is not displayed
commitResults.messageBody: Changed: Changed write file implementation such that the file is changed immediately after changes to checklist have been made

commitResults.messageTitle: Added: Jar file
